about.title: About
about.bio1: I am a painter based in [Your City], inspired by nature, light, and human emotion. My practice explores color fields, texture, and the interplay between abstraction and representation.
about.bio2: My work has been exhibited in group and solo shows and is held in private collections worldwide. When not in the studio, I enjoy teaching workshops and collaborating on community art projects.
